Submodules¶

Mikado.exceptions module¶

Custom exceptions for Mikado.py.

exception Mikado.exceptions.IncorrectStrandError[source]¶

Bases: Mikado.exceptions.InvalidTranscript

Exception to be raised when a transcript contains an invalid intron (e.g. an AG-GT intron assigned to the minus strand).

exception Mikado.exceptions.InvalidAssembly[source]¶

Bases: ValueError

Exception to be raised when the input for prepare is not properly formatted.

exception Mikado.exceptions.InvalidCDS[source]¶

Bases: Mikado.exceptions.InvalidTranscript

Exception to be raised when a transcript contains an invalid CDS (e.g. with a UTR in the middle).

exception Mikado.exceptions.InvalidJson[source]¶

Bases: KeyError

Exception to be raised when the JSON/YAML is invalid.

exception Mikado.exceptions.InvalidLocusError[source]¶

Bases: ValueError

Exception to be raised when something has made a Locus object invalid.

exception Mikado.exceptions.InvalidTranscript[source]¶

Bases: ValueError

Exception to be raised when a transcript contains corrupted data (e.g. overlapping or missing exons).

exception Mikado.exceptions.ModificationError[source]¶

Bases: RuntimeError

This exception is raised when something tries to modify a finalized object.

exception Mikado.exceptions.NoJsonConfigError[source]¶

Bases: ValueError

Exception to be raised if no/an invalid configuration dictionary has been provided.

exception Mikado.exceptions.NotInLocusError[source]¶

Bases: AssertionError

Error to be raised when a method tries to add a transcript to a Locus it does not belong to.

exception Mikado.exceptions.RedundantNames[source]¶

Bases: KeyError

exception Mikado.exceptions.UnrecognizedOperator[source]¶

Bases: ValueError

Exception to be raised when the configuration file contains an unsupported operator for a scoring/filtering function.

exception Mikado.exceptions.UnrecognizedRescaler[source]¶

Bases: ValueError

Exception to be raised when the configuration file contains an unsupported rescaling function for a scoring operation.

exception Mikado.exceptions.UnsortedInput[source]¶

Bases: ValueError

Exception to be raised when the input for pick is not properly sorted.

Module contents¶

Mikado is a Python suite whose purpose is to find and resolve genic loci in a genomic annotation. This is the library it relies onto.
